item.title: TKO, Polymarket strike multiyear deal to integrate prediction markets into UFC events
item.description: The deal makes UFC and Zuffa Boxing the first sports organizations to incorporate prediction market technology into live events.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Walt Disney, Cisco Systems, Firefly Aerospace and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in early trading.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Cisco, Flutter Entertainment, Firefly and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

item.title: Boston Fed President Collins advocates holding rates steady, sees 'high bar' for further cuts
item.description: Collins on Wednesday said she will be reluctant to support further interest rate cuts anytime soon with inflation still high.

item.title: Skims valued at $5 billion after new funding round as it accelerates store expansion
item.description: Kim Kardashian's Skims raised $225 million from Goldman Sachs, valuing the brand at $5 billion. The capital will fund expansion and could delay an exp...
